channel.title: Connecting to an RS server
channel.description: How many of you have ever connected to a RS server using a no-ip thing i haven't well can't they just tell there IP address. the only time i've got it to connect is with a IP address!!! Hail NeonScape PK

item.title: Connecting to an RS server
item.dc:creator: @eambo eambo
item.description:
@eambo wrote:

Ip addresses can be used maliciously, whereas no-ip “masks” the ip. Plus I think runescape.no-ip.org is easier to remember than 168.109.276.584 =-)

Read full topic
